SpaceIdle.title: Space Idle
SpaceIdle.description: SpaceIdle is a single-player management game set in the year 2248. Players take on the role of a manager of a space mining corporation, exploring asteroids and managing resources. The main objective is to grow the corporation through mining, trading, and investing in advanced technologies. The game features dynamic market prices, automatic asteroid mining, and various upgrades to enhance efficiency. Players can also process resources in factories and invest in research to unlock new gameplay elements.

IdleWorld.title: IdleWorld
IdleWorld.description: Battle monsters: Face a variety of monsters, earning money and rewards for each defeat. Develop your skills: Focus on becoming a master in various skills such as combat, crafting, and magic. Hire heroes at the tavern: Discover the ability to hire heroes who will assist you in challenging battles. Craft items: Gather resources and create powerful items that will enhance your chances of success. Are you ready to become a legend in this fantastic world? Join the game now and start your adventure!
